episodes.title: She Deleted this Video But.... | Tranont Health Claims, MLM Cult Vibes & Comment Meltdown
episodes.description:
It all started in my comment section when Sarah from Tranont came in swinging with classic MLM tactics: insults, toxic positivity, red herrings, and survivor bias. After she called me bitter (multiple times), told me to “stay irrelevant,” and accused me of eating too much McDonald’s, I decided to click on her profile to see what was up. 

And surprise! She had multiple videos promoting Tranont with bold health claims, GLP-1 boosting drinks, products that turn carbs into fiber, and a whole lot of pseudoscience sprinkled with spiritual manipulation. So fascinating because all of that goes against Tranont's own policies. 

After I called her out publicly for it… poof. One of those videos magically disappeared. Too bad I already downloaded it. 

In this video, I break down her comment meltdown, expose the manipulation, and react to the deleted video she probably hoped no one saved.

Spoiler: I saved it and many others. This isn't a new tactic from someone in an MLM.

Remember folks, when they resort to ad hominem's, they can't refute the information and facts being shared. 

🔻 WATCH NEXT (The Video She Commented On): https://youtu.be/6MKHpdHgutc?si=AlSZq8DkUvejSZ2p

👉 Anti-MLM Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLVAIE_vPKDB-gTYyZPxcd_R_nDoHZfKjd

Video Editor: @evamateja! Please subscribe to her channel.

Grab the book! 👉 https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/715421/little-bosses-everywhere-by-bridget-read/

*Join this channel to get access to perks:*
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYVGhyc-V7c7bu2pgwqrBeQ/join

FTC Information about MLM: https://consumer.ftc.gov/articles/multi-level-marketing-businesses-pyramid-schemes

Report Fraud, Medical Claims and Health Claims to the FTC: https://reportfraud.ftc.gov/#/

Contact me at www.ErinBies.com

** This video was created and published for educational purposes. All opinions are mine and based on my own experiences. Please do not send any hate or negativity to anyone involved in an MLM. The best thing you can do to support them is to listen, be kind and connect them to resources so they can make their own decisions. Not everyone involved with an MLM is a bad person. They are very much a victim of their upline and company that have manipulated them to make money, in my opinion. Everything shared in this video and on this account are protected under the Fair Use Act. **










tranont mlm, anti mlm commentary, mlm health claims, glp-1 supplement scam, carb to fiber claim, pseudoscience debunked, anti mlm takedown, emotional manipulation in mlm, wellness fairy dust, MLM cult tactics, MLM receipts, erinbies

episodes.title: Revealing the Truth: A Former Monat Rep Uncovers the MLM Cult Behind the Scenes #antimlm
episodes.description:
In this revealing video, a former Monat rep steps forward to uncover the hidden realities of the MLM cult tactics used by the company. From manipulative recruitment strategies to misleading income promises, discover how Monat operates in the shadows. Whether you’re curious about the predatory MLM world or seeking the truth behind Monat, this video has the answers. Protect yourself from deceptive multi-level marketing schemes.

🔔 Be sure to like, comment, and subscribe for more hard-hitting anti-MLM content!

Video Credit: @Kelsiielizabeth https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yGIYNkFhrDw
